title: Parker: Texas is home to a new tech boom — let's keep it that way - The Cross Timbers Gazette
content: Parker: Texas is home to a new tech boom — let's keep it that way  The Cross Timbers Gazette
description: Many stories have been written about Texas’ “sudden” tech boom; however, the truth is that legislators in the Lone Star State have spent decades laying the groundwork to bring these industry leaders from around the country to cities like Austin, Houston, and Dallas. As we look to this upcoming year, we must continue to focus […]
